Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel

Class Market

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedMarket
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel.Market
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Market
extends RedMarket
Market Class defines the contents and behaviour of the game's market. A Market Class-type object contains a 2D-array final attribute containing marbles and an extra marble to push inside the market whenever a player buys resources.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method is used to reset the market to initial conditions, with randomized marbles inside the 2D-array.

    • rowToResources

      public void rowToResources​(int row, Player player) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used when a player chooses a row he wants to buy from the market.

      It transforms the selected row of marbles into a ResourceStack of resources which will then be processed by the Resource Manager. The player's faith is also updated if the row contains red marbles and the method transforms white marbles if it is necessary.

      Parameters:
      row - is the number indicating the row.
      player - is the player corresponding to the action (needed to update faith).
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • rowChange

      public void rowChange​(int row)
      Changes market after a row purchase.
      Parameters:
      row - row to be changes.

    • columnToResources

      public void columnToResources​(int column, Player player) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used when a player chooses a column he wants to buy from the market.

      It transforms the selected column of marbles into a ResourceStack of resources which will then be processed by the Resource Manager. The player's faith is also updated if the column contains red marbles and the method transforms white marbles if it is necessary.

      Parameters:
      column - is the number indicating the column.
      player - is the player corresponding to the action (needed to update faith). not have such card, the parameter should be null.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • columnChange

      public void columnChange​(int column)
      Realigns Market after a column choice.
      Parameters:
      column - index of the column to change.

    • whiteMarbleToResource

      public void whiteMarbleToResource​(Player player, LeaderCard leaderCard) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Converts a white marble to a resource based on the Leader Card given.
      Parameters:
      player - player who bought from the market.
      leaderCard - Leader Card from which to get the white marble.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are no white marbles to convert or if the Leader Card is not active or not of type WHITEMARBLE.

    • setExtraMarble

      public void setExtraMarble​(Marble extraMarble)
      Setter for "extraMarble" attribute.
      Overrides:
      setExtraMarble in class RedMarket

    • testMethod

      public void testMethod()
      This method is used for test purposes only.
